languages.text: {n}Уголок губ ползет вверх, и старая, ироничная усмешка возникает на лице Инцендии, а в голос просачивается толика яда:{/n} "То, что моя гордость лежит в руинах, не значит, что некоторым молодым Вольным Торговцам стоит задирать передо мной нос. За моими плечами сотни экспедиций и битв, а мое сердце еще помнит жар, требующий правосудия Императора. Когда потребуется, он обернется пламенем, который я изолью на Его врагов".

{n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."
languages.original_text: {n}Уголок губ ползет вверх, и старая, ироничная усмешка возникает на лице Инцендии, а в голос просачивается толика яда:{/n} "То, что моя гордость лежит в руинах, не значит, что некоторым молодым Вольным Торговцам стоит задирать передо мной нос. За моими плечами сотни экспедиций и битв, а мое сердце еще помнит жар, требующий правосудия Императора. Когда потребуется, он обернется пламенем, который я изолью на Его врагов".

I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat demanding that the Emperor's justice be served. When the hour comes, this heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

languages.text: {n}Du siehst Incendias Mundwinkel zucken, ehe sie dich verschlagen anlächelt und sich ein Hauch von Gift in ihre Stimme schleicht.{/n} "Der Umstand, dass mein Stolz in Trümmern liegt, gibt frischgebackenen {mf|Freihändlern|Freihändlerinnen} noch lange nicht das Recht, auf mich herabzublicken. Ich habe schon an Hunderten von Expeditionen teilgenommen und Hunderte Schlachten geschlagen ... und doch erinnert sich mein Herz an die Hitze, mit der es der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators zu dienen gilt. Wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, wird aus dieser Hitze eine Flamme, mit der ich Seine Feinde verbrennen werde."
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Du siehst Incendias Mundwinkel zucken, ehe sie dich verschlagen anlächelt und sich ein Hauch von Gift in ihre Stimme schleicht.{/n} "Der Umstand, dass mein Stolz in Trümmern liegt, gibt frischgebackenen {mf|Freihändlern|Freihändlerinnen} noch lange nicht das Recht, auf mich herabzublicken. Ich habe schon an Hunderten von Expeditionen teilgenommen und Hunderte Schlachten geschlagen ... und doch erinnert sich mein Herz an die Hitze, mit der es der Gerechtigkeit des Imperators zu dienen gilt. Wenn die Zeit gekommen ist, wird aus dieser Hitze eine Flamme, mit der ich Seine Feinde verbrennen werde."

languages.text: {n}Vous décelez un léger frémissement aux commissures de ses lèvres, et un sourire familier éclaire ses traits alors qu'elle répond d'une voix venimeuse :{/n} « Ma fierté bafouée ne donne pas le droit à des libres-marchands en herbe de me prendre de haut. J'ai participé à des centaines d'expéditions et livré des centaines de batailles, et mon cœur n'a pas oublié la flamme qui nous exhorte à rendre justice au nom de l'Empereur. Le moment venu, cette flamme se transformera en brasier, et je déchaînerai Sa sainte colère contre Ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous décelez un léger frémissement aux commissures de ses lèvres, et un sourire familier éclaire ses traits alors qu'elle répond d'une voix venimeuse :{/n} « Ma fierté bafouée ne donne pas le droit à des libres-marchands en herbe de me prendre de haut. J'ai participé à des centaines d'expéditions et livré des centaines de batailles, et mon cœur n'a pas oublié la flamme qui nous exhorte à rendre justice au nom de l'Empereur. Le moment venu, cette flamme se transformera en brasier, et je déchaînerai Sa sainte colère contre Ses ennemis. »

languages.text: {n}あなたはインセンディアの口角が引きつり、その顔に見慣れたゆがんだ笑みが浮かび、その声にかすかな毒気が忍び寄るのに気づいた。{/n}「私の誇りが瓦礫と化したからといって、駆け出しの自由開拓者に蔑まれるいわれはない。私は何百もの遠征に加わり、何百もの戦いを切り抜けてきたのだ。そして私の心は、仕えるべき皇帝の正義を追い求める熱をまだ覚えている。時が来たればその熱は炎となり、主の敵へとそれを解き放つだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはインセンディアの口角が引きつり、その顔に見慣れたゆがんだ笑みが浮かび、その声にかすかな毒気が忍び寄るのに気づいた。{/n}「私の誇りが瓦礫と化したからといって、駆け出しの自由開拓者に蔑まれるいわれはない。私は何百もの遠征に加わり、何百もの戦いを切り抜けてきたのだ。そして私の心は、仕えるべき皇帝の正義を追い求める熱をまだ覚えている。時が来たればその熱は炎となり、主の敵へとそれを解き放つだろう」

languages.text: {n}Ves que la comisura de los labios de Incendia se crispa. Una familiar sonrisa torcida aparece en su rostro al tiempo que un deje de veneno impregna su voz.{/n} «Mi orgullo estará en ruinas, pero eso no otorga a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente neófit{mf|o|a} el derecho de menospreciarme. Me he embarcado en cientos de expediciones y he librado cientos de batallas, y mi corazón aún recuerda el calor que exige que se aplique la justicia del Emperador. Cuando llegue el momento, el calor se convertirá en un incendio devastador que desataré contra Sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ves que la comisura de los labios de Incendia se crispa. Una familiar sonrisa torcida aparece en su rostro al tiempo que un deje de veneno impregna su voz.{/n} «Mi orgullo estará en ruinas, pero eso no otorga a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente neófit{mf|o|a} el derecho de menospreciarme. Me he embarcado en cientos de expediciones y he librado cientos de batallas, y mi corazón aún recuerda el calor que exige que se aplique la justicia del Emperador. Cuando llegue el momento, el calor se convertirá en un incendio devastador que desataré contra Sus enemigos».

languages.text: {n}你看到因森蒂娅的嘴角抽搐着。她的脸上露出了你熟悉的扭曲笑容，声音中渗着一丝恶毒。{/n}“我的骄傲已经毁于一旦，但这并不意味着某些初出茅庐的行商浪人有资格蔑视我。我踏上过几百次远征，参加过几百场恶战，而我的心里依然充满热忱，渴望伸张帝皇的正义。只要时机一到，这股热忱就会化为烈焰，将祂的敌人化为灰烬。”
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."

traits.locale_text: {n}你看到因森蒂娅的嘴角抽搐着。她的脸上露出了你熟悉的扭曲笑容，声音中渗着一丝恶毒。{/n}“我的骄傲已经毁于一旦，但这并不意味着某些初出茅庐的行商浪人有资格蔑视我。我踏上过几百次远征，参加过几百场恶战，而我的心里依然充满热忱，渴望伸张帝皇的正义。只要时机一到，这股热忱就会化为烈焰，将祂的敌人化为灰烬。”

languages.text: {n}İncendia'nın ağzının kenarının kıvrıldığını, yüzünde o tanıdık, çarpık gülümsemesinin peyda olduğunu ve sesine zehirli bir tınının yayıldığını görüyorsun.{/n} "Gururumun yerle bir olmuş olması, çömez Hür Tacirlere bana tepeden bakma hakkı vermez. Yüzlerce sefere katıldım, yüzlerce muharebede savaştım. Kalbim, İmparator'un adaletinin ateşini gayet iyi hatırlıyor. O an geldiğinde bu ateş bir yangına dönüşecek, ben de bu yangını O'nun düşmanlarının üzerine salacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}You see the corner of Incendia's mouth twitch, and a familiar crooked smile appears on her face as a hint of venom creeps into her voice:{/n} "That my pride lies in ruins does not give certain fledgling Rogue Traders the right to look down their nose at me. I have embarked on hundreds of expeditions and fought hundreds of battles, and my heart yet remembers the heat that calls for the Emperor's justice to be served. When the hour comes, that heat will turn into a blaze, which I shall unleash upon His enemies."
